structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Whenever an active or retired policeman or firefighter dies from any cause, the board of trustees shall appropriate from the pension fund a sum not exceeding one hundred dollars ($100), made payable to the widow or family, for funeral expenses.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 41, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 17.
